title: SALSA & LATIN JAZZ typeface
content:
Is this typeface used for the titles a modified Chalet? Or maybe something else?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034131im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/31V31MZYD7L_5267._SS500_.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034131im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/41HB08360XL_4178._SS400_.jpg)

 [‹ Sans serif with rough ink-gaps?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034131/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42882 "Go to previous forum topic") [Custom Drawn? To good to be a font! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034131/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42872 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mrpink

comments.content: I doubt this exists as a font — this is probably a customized anemic Helvetica.

Hi,

Im working on very thin font called think, with 10 em of stem.  
See in action.

Thanks  
Eduardo Rodríguez Tunni  
www.tipo.net.ar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034131im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/think_3770.png)
